snippet: There is hopeful news in the battle against this incurable disease: scientists and the Obama administration are making progress on this intractable form of dementia.
abstract: Editorial asserts that promising research advances suggest that scientists could well make substantial progress in fighting and treating Alzheimer's disease if given more funding; argues that it is vitally important that the federal government fund Alzheimer's research, even in tough economic times.
lead_paragraph: There is hopeful news in the battle against this incurable disease: scientists and the Obama administration are making progress on this intractable form of dementia.
